data.text: You're back at the boutique where you ran from that green-haired creature. You could go back in, if you wanted.
You pull the door open and step inside. Sounds of stomping and grumbling suddenly halt as a bell above the door - not there previously - chimes gently.

Before you can decide whether to run off again, the back room door is thrown open and the large, shaggy-haired creature shambles out. It's wearing a different outfit than last time, though its clothes still seem just as random.
Just as before, the creature stomps towards you, shouting "Clothes! Clothes!" in a heavily-distorted voice. It seems to be intent on thrusting a t-shirt at you.
You turn and sprint for the door. The thing roars behind you, shouting "CLOTHES!" again in a bestial voice.
But it doesn't seem to follow you out of the boutique. You slow down after crossing the street, catching your breath and hearing it crash around in there. After a minute or two, it quiets down.
